name: BIG HAND
description:
BIG HAND is an action, puzzle, platformer that is controlled entirely with a mouse.

Little Fella has been displaced from his natural habitat! You, a spectral glove must escort this defenseless creature back home. Grab, pull, point, punch and throw objects to protect Little Fella. If Little Fella takes too much damage, it's all over!

Current State of the game:

16 levels each with bonus puzzles within them.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Will make a click causing Little Fella to jump.

Hold Left Mouse Button: Will make a pointing pose.

Hold Right Mouse Button: Will allow you to pick up objects/make a fist pose.

Future of the game:

If this project gets enough attention we will be considering expanding it into a longer and more in depth experience.

Credits:

Lead Artist: Charles O'Loughlan

Game Design: Charles O'Loughlan, Ewen Green
